name: Right of Final Interpretation
description: When Yanfei has this card equipped and uses a Charged Attack: +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP. If Scarlet Seal is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.
descriptionraw: When $[A1308] has this card equipped and uses a $[K51]: +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP. If $[K1010] is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.
descriptionreplaced: When Yanfei has this card equipped and uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>: +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scarlet Seal</color> is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.
